phrases: You would not explain anything over the phone...
I would like you to help me.
I am being attacked by an enemy Stand.
It is a very dangerous Stand.
I am not sure what I should do.
Could you show it to me?
But if you do not show it to me...
If I show it to you, it will kill me and transfer over to you!
Hurry up and burn them, okay?
Did you call me over here just to mess with me?
If I show you my back, I will die!
But you are always messing with me, Sensei.
So that is what is going on.
I am being serious right now!
Climb over me, and go ahead.
He had the life sucked out of him, and he dried up!
You did a great job making that.
But this is no time to be joking around, Sensei!
The Stand users made by the old man in the picture are really after us.
So I rushed over here, thinking that something might have happened to you, too!
I asked you to come because I knew those shitbags
Josuke and Okuyasu would not believe me!
We are friends, are not we?!
Even though this has got to hurt...
I, Rohan Kishibe, have never faced such humiliation...
Lately, my nails are growing fast again.
That woman running her fingers through her prized, well-cared-for hair...
I will hold off on picking you right now.
Until I can completely blend into Kosaku Kawajiri's lifestyle.
my dad, like, totally follows me in secret, or comes snooping around.
You are going out at night too much.
I got super pissed off, so I totally stole something in front of him on purpose.
And then I went straight to your place.
They have probably got the cops looking for you now.
What are you touching my bag for?
Come on, we are getting off.
Watch where you are going when you get off the train!
He had a bowling pin nail clipper.
A bowling pin nail clipper, in this day and age...
Hey, where are you going with the pictures?
That is the only place I can go now.
It does not matter where you go, okay?
Just give up and burn the pictures.
Even though you do not know who could be watching from which window.
There is no way you can cross.
Someone will see your back for sure.
The road's just going to get wider, and there will be even more people.
So let us just not go!
There is no way you can cross.
Masazo Kinoto came all the way to my house.
He must have crossed an intersection, as well.
I just have to figure out how he crossed it.
And he did it... like this!
This is ridiculously embarrassing, but I can make it to the station this way.
When Masazo Kinoto was crossing, I did not interfere with him!
Why are you walking so slow?
You are the one forgetting something, Cheap Trap.
Masazo Kinoto did not have this...
He did not have Heaven's Door!
Cannot turn around for one minute.
Now I should have no problem walking so that no one sees my back.
You would better be prepared, you bastard.
There is no way you are going to make it.
You are the one who is going to die with your dick all shriveled up.
Your only ability is to talk.
Wh-Wh-Who the hell do you think you are talking to?!
Looks like there are not any big intersections for a while.
Hey, can you use your Heaven's Door ability on animals, too?
Yeah, if the animal has any intelligence.
So that means if an animal sees your back, I can transfer over to them, too!
I have to be careful of these guys, too.
So one of these guys just has to glance at your back, right?
My ability is only to speak.
But, you see, humans are not the only ones that I can talk to.
I am the one who called them here.
I just told them that you love killing cats and dogs!
These animals did not do anything wrong.
I thought that you might just be messing with me,
but I was still a bit worried, so I went back,
and you were still acting weird, Rohan-sensei.
Even outside your house, you were walking with your back to walls,
and crossing the street with your back to someone else's, all by yourself.
So you really do have an enemy Stand on your back.
That is exactly what I admire so much about you...
It is on your back, right?
I just have to remove the enemy from your back, right?
Are not you a bit naIve?
I am not sticking to your back with strength, but with my ability.
Trying to forcibly remove me from your back
means that you will destroy your back.
Go ahead and tell Koichi, okay?
I am very moved that you came here, and very grateful...
But I would appreciate it if you would withdraw Act 3.
You cannot see it, but my back is starting to rip ever so slightly...
Of course I am not okay, Koichi Hirose!
This damage is your fault, is not it?
There is no way to get rid of me.
Peeling me off your back, Rohan,
means that you will be peeling away your own back!
You are just going to wear yourself out.
Either you will pass out from exhaustion and damage first,
or you will go crazy and kill yourself...
No matter how great the Stand,
they cannot defeat me if my only ability is to talk!
You want to see what kind of Stand it is?
I will show it to you.
Looks like you have finally lost it!
I guess you finally realized it is no use going to Jotaro, either!
I was not heading there in the first place.
I was so happy to finally make it here
that I could not help but laugh.
You finally showed your back to someone!
I am now going to possess Koichi Hirose!
Cheap Trap, you turned around here.
Even if you did not turn around because you knew what this place was,
because of your ability, you had no choice but to look Koichi's way.
The alley where Reimi is, where you cannot turn around, no matter what!
It is true that if any Stand tried to get rid of you, no matter what it was,
you would return the damage to me.
But there was something that could grasp only you...
Something that will only take those who look back.
Something that will only take your soul!
Where do you think you are taking me?!
I do not know if Heaven or Hell actually exist,
but just in case, I will write it in for you.
It would not do anything except talk, but that was one intense Stand.
Koichi, if you had not come,
I would not have made it here, and it would have killed me.
But since I was so focused on that thing,
I had no idea we would end up here.
Did you take these pictures, Rohan?
got her boyfriend to buy her some expensive brand earrings.
What do you think you are doing in my apartment?!
Would you be kind enough to tell me your name?
My nails are quite long, are not they?
Is there anyone who can actually stop their nails from growing?
Just as no one can stop their nails from growing,
you cannot stop the destiny you were born with.
I believe I asked for your name...
What did you do to my
Do not answer a question with a question!
Did not they teach you in school not to answer a question with a question?!
I am asking you what your name is!
Your parents gave you a beautiful name.
It would make me happy if you would hold these.
I want you to cut my nails with these geeky nail clippers.
You have never cut someone else's nails?
There is a first time for everything.
Be careful not to cut them too short.
I am not angry or anything.
I chose you because you suited my taste, as well.
I was born with these tastes, so I am just trying to act positively about it.
It sounded like you were asking your boyfriend for some earrings.
Here, he left these for you.
You are very good at cutting nails.
I like that about you, too.
And you are truly adorable when you do not talk.
I want to take you home with me,
but bringing you into the Kawajiri home would be risky.
Th-The man and woman he followed from the station...
He killed them and made them disappear!
What is he doing in a place like this?
This is the opposite direction from the house and his school...
I did not lock the door...
What is that thing that is disguised as my dad?
There is evidence that they have been back here.
And there are blood stains on the floor.
Did he finally make his move?
The thing in Hayato's hand was definitely a handy cam.
It does not seem to be in this room right now...
He is been acting weird ever since the other day.
I have to find out what Hayato was doing.
I have to find out for sure.
I have to calm down and gather my thoughts.
Should I show it to someone?
I cannot show it to Mom!
Should I show it to the police?
Would they believe that a person got blown up and then disappeared?
More importantly, he is not human...
Could the police even catch someone like him?
Does anyone even exist in this world who could catch him?
Mom and I are going to be killed eventually.
What am I supposed to do?!
Do you mind if I join you...
I-I am going to head out now.
I will be in trouble if he finds this tape.
I am sorry, Hayato, but could you let go of the bucket?
I want to draw some water and wash my body.
I-I will wash your back for you, Dad!
But I will wash your back first.
You are the one who got in first.
I will wash yours first, then we can switch.
You seem to be sweating quite a bit.
Did you get get too hot?
Is not it strange to shiver if you are overheated?
You should know that I have always been ticklish!
You have always been ticklish, Hayato.
So you will do it yourself.
By the way, I just remembered...
I was around the Jozenji area that is in the opposite direction from home,
I thought I would peacefully fit into this household...
I have had nothing but misfortune this year.
Killing this brat will draw attention to myself, and that would be very bad.
But since he saw that, I have no choice!
I just turned one of the strands of this brat's hair into a bomb.
If I just because a slight explosion on his head,
it will just look like he slipped and hit his head on the bath.
That is a common accident in our society.
Are you going to kill me, too?
Even though I have got video of you...
I am even videotaping you right now!
I have been suspicious of you this whole time.
and the fact that you were practicing your signature are all on tape!
I have got other tapes, too!
I even took a video of the cat-like plant you have got in the attic!
I am the only one who knows where the tapes are!
But if something were to happen to me, I am sure someone would find that place.
Do not you dare lay a finger on me!
I will not let you touch my mom, either!
Episode 35 B ites the D ust, Part 1
